stance_1: I am motivated by my own stomach issues
stance_2: I experienced acid reflux from some meats
justification: The interviewee explicitly says their stomach issues and acid reflux motivate their meat choices.

stance_1: I ate a lot of meat growing up
stance_2: My mother ate a lot of meat
justification: The interviewee explicitly links her high meat consumption growing up to her mother's eating habits.

stance_1: I have reduced red meat consumption
